QuestData.Title: Deanimate the Reanimated
QuestData.Description: I've got much to do here, $n. I could use your help.$B$BThere's a place to the northwest. The pandaren here call it Mogujia. Something's causing the statues there to animate, and our pandaren friends here are pretty spooked about it.$B$BIf they're not dealt with soon, we might have a serious problem. We just moved in. It's not like we can afford to fight a war with an army of statues right now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy any 14 Terracotta Warriors or Terracotta Guardians.
